title: 13 open source projects transforming AI and machine learning
description: From deepfakes to natural language processing and more, the open source world is ripe with projects to support software development on the frontiers of artificial intelligence and machine learning.

title: DeepMind advances AI safety with new Sparrow chatbot
description: Alphabet Inc.’s DeepMind unit today debuted Sparrow, an artificial intelligence-powered chatbot described as a milestone in the industry effort to develop safer machine learning systems.

title: Did .NET MAUI ship too soon? Devs sound off on 'Massive mistake'
description: Microsoft never ships a product until it is ready!

title: Google is (unsurprisingly) shutting down Stadia in January
description: "I’m shocked. SHOCKED! Well, not that shocked."

title: Intel SDKs give developers tools for AI, quantum software
description: Intel launched new SDKs for AI and quantum computing and added tools underpinned by the Intel Developer Cloud in an effort to attract developers to build on its hardware.

title: Meta announces Make-A-Video, which generates video from text
Meta's AI guru LeCun: Most of today's AI approaches will never lead to true intelligence
description: Fundamental problems elude many strains of deep learning, says LeCun, including the mystery of how to measure information.

title: Microsoft Trains Two Billion Parameter Vision-Language AI Model BEiT-3
description: Researchers from Microsoft's Natural Language Computing (NLC) group announced the latest version of Bidirectional Encoder representation from Image Transformers: BEiT-3, a 1.9B parameter vision-language AI model. BEiT-3 models images as another language and achieves state-of-the-art performance on a wide range of downstream tasks.

description: You've got real numbers, imaginary numbers, now mythical numbers!

description: Last November, we announced the release of the Windows ML Samples Gallery. The newest release of the gallery adds 4 new samples, 2 of which are discussed in detail below.
